constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 97 (Friday, June 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NORMAN:
H.R. 3727.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8
[Page H2693]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Fair-Value Accounting and Budget Act
